vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector
vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Address.isContract (TokenVesting.sol#208-221) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (TokenVesting.sol#502-512):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = _releasableAmount(token) (TokenVesting.sol#503)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _released (TokenVesting.sol#507)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (TokenVesting.sol#519-533):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (TokenVesting.sol#523)
	- unreleased = _releasableAmount(token) (TokenVesting.sol#525)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _revoked (TokenVesting.sol#528)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TokenVesting.constructor (TokenVesting.sol#434-447) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(start.add(duration) > block.timestamp,TokenVesting: final time is before current time) (TokenVesting.sol#440)

vulnerability_findings.name: timestamp
vulnerability_findings.message:
TokenVesting._vestedAmount (TokenVesting.sol#547-558) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _start.add(_duration) || _revoked[address(token)] (TokenVesting.sol#553-557)
	- block.timestamp < _cliff (TokenVesting.sol#551-557)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
Address.isContract uses assembly (TokenVesting.sol#208-221)
	- TokenVesting.sol#219
